body:
Comment 14: 
I don't think we should support CBC at all. Doing MtE/M&E CBC correctly is very hard and
we would undoubtedly end up with some "I hope it's good enough" implementation, thus
perpetuating the cycle of crypto-nonsense. Implementations capable of EtM CBC will also
be capable of CTR mode I believe.

(The same argument applies to TLS where we don't implement MtE CBC correctly either. I'd
love to get rid of CBC mode there also, but the compatibility situation is sadly very
different with TLS.)
